function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of infection through patient bookings and virtual doctor interactions.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in medical settings.","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation and hygiene protocols for virtual and in-person interactions, and ensure proper ventilation in medical facilities.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, and telemedicine platforms with secure communication features.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and support staff.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and technology developers."},{"Description":"Increased reliance on IoT for healthcare operations and drug delivery during epidemics.","Impact":"Cybersecurity risks, potential data breaches, and disruption of healthcare services if IoT systems are compromised.","Mitigation":"Implement robust cybersecurity measures, encryption protocols, and regular security audits of IoT devices and networks.","Technologies":"Blockchain for data security, encrypted communication protocols, and IoT security platforms.","People":"Healthcare organizations, IT security experts, and IoT system administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and IT security teams."},{"Description":"Use of drone technology for the delivery of medical supplies and goods during epidemics.","Impact":"Risk of drone malfunction or accidents leading to potential exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough risk assessments, implement drone maintenance protocols, and establish safe drone delivery routes and procedures.","Technologies":"Drone maintenance and monitoring systems, geofencing technology, and real-time tracking and surveillance systems.","People":"Drone operators, healthcare organizations, and public safety officials.","Owner":"Drone operators, healthcare institutions, and aviation authorities."}]}
